update rsk_blackwhite_list set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fin_instr_id = #{finInstrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fin_instr_type = #{finInstrType,jdbcType=BIT}, blackwhite_list_type = #{blackwhiteListType,jdbcType=BIT}, is_black = #{isBlack,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where blackwhite_id = #{blackwhiteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into rsk_blackwhite_list_snaps SELECT CAST(DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(3),'%Y%m%d%H%i%S%f')/1000 AS UNSIGNED),tb.* from rsk_blackwhite_list as tb where blackwhite_id= #{blackwhite_id}
